settings.title: Wholesale Signup Form
settings.content:
Welcome to The Distro! We've has the pleasure of serving over 1,500 individually owned and operated vape shops accross Canada and we're excited to begin serving you!

Please fill the form below completely to start ordering popular products for your retail store.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer:
We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

You typically have a 30 day return policy for defective products, and this will be applied as a credit towards future orders.

We also offer a 1 year compliancy program, which ensures the products you are carrying are compliant and can be exchanged for other products if and when regulations changes.

settings.title: How do I handle defective products?
settings.answer:
All non-excise products that are defective can be credited over the phone, with the exception of credit requests of 30 items or more, which will require shipping.

All excise tax products will require return shipping for all defective products.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing
